reviewText:
Topic of interest :)

It is important to recognize people that achieve results in any Industry , especially when your skills involve the safety of others.
Hats of to all drivers that are employed in areas of transport whether it be related to transportation of goods or people.

Safety on our roads is a World wide concern.  Truck drivers tend to have a reputation for driving haphazardly,this video shows the training truck drivers receive, and condition they keep their vehicles.  They should be recognized for their skills and hazards they deal with and overcome on a day to day basis.
